com.sun.identity.liberty.ws.common.wsse.BinarySecurityToken

    Package Description
    com.sun.identity.liberty.ws.disco

    Defines DST.
    com.sun.identity.liberty.ws.security
    Provides interface to manage liberty security
    com.sun.identity.liberty.ws.soapbinding
    Provides classes to manage Liberty SOAP Binding.

      Constructor and Description
      DSTClient(BinarySecurityToken token, String soapURI, String providerID)

      DSTClient(BinarySecurityToken token, String soapURI, String providerID, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse httpResponse)
      Constructor The constructor connects to Data Service with WSS SAML token, the HttpServletRequest and HttpServletResponse object of the current request agent will be used for resource owner interactions if needed.
